Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-42067 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.43.1-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-42067 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.43.1-7. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.43.1-7, affected by CVE-2024-42067
